publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7703 Hugh O’Donnell: Violence against Christian Communities in Egypt and Iraq—That the Parliament condemns violence against any religious or faith community as an affront to human liberty and rights and urges the UK Government to express its abhorrence at recent attacks on Christian communities at worship in Egypt and Iraq and to press the authorities in these countries on the need to make the strongest efforts to bring the perpetrators to justice.

S3M-7703 Hugh O’Donnell: Violence against Christian Communities in Egypt and Iraq—That the Parliament condemns violence against any religious or faith community as an affront to human liberty and rights and urges the UK Government to express its abhorrence at recent attacks on Christian communities at worship in Egypt and Iraq and to press the authorities in these countries on the need to make the strongest efforts to bring the perpetrators to justice.
S3M-7703 Violence against Christian Communities in Egypt and Iraq (lodged on 13 January 2011) Jamie Hepburn*, Linda Fabiani*

S3M-7703 Violence against Christian Communities in Egypt and Iraq (lodged on 13 January 2011) Robin Harper*, Bill Kidd*, Kenneth Gibson*, Ken Macintosh*, Dave Thompson*, Bob Doris*, Ross Finnie*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Murdo Fraser*, Mike Pringle*
S3M-7703 Violence against Christian Communities in Egypt and Iraq (lodged on 13 January 2011) Jim Tolson*
S3M-7703 Violence against Christian Communities in Egypt and Iraq (lodged on 13 January 2011) Gil Paterson*
